subject: Olympic Games
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: Steffen Peters won the national Grand Prix dressage championship and earned one of four Olympic berths by winning the freestyle event at the Olympic dressage trials in San Juan Capistrano, Calif. Debbie McDonald, Courtney King and Leslie Morse also qualified for the United States team for the Beijing Games.
